Computes CPUE

Source: R/artfish_compute_cpue.R
compute_cpue.Rd

The CPUE (Catch Per Unit of Effort) is computed from the landings, as the ratio between nominal landed catches (catch_nominal_landed) and the effort fishing duration (effort_fishing_duration).

The computation is performed grouped by a strata compound by year, month and fishing_unit. This strata can be extended with additional columns with the minor_strata argument.

Since landings give details data on landed species, nominal landed catches are sum grouped by the strata and by fishing trip to get the total nominal landed catches by fishing trip. Both catch_nominal_landed and effort_fishing_duration are then sum by strata and the CPUE is computed as the ratio of these sum.

Note: Additional checks are performed to remove data with NAs.

Usage

compute_cpue(landings, minor_strata = NULL)

Arguments

landings

landings

minor_strata

minor_strata. Default is NULL

Value

a tibble object giving the CPUE by strata
